name: Jens Johansson
description:
'''Jens Ola Johansson''' (born 2 November 1963 in [[Stockholm]]) is a Swedish keyboardist and pianist. Jens got famous in the early 80's when he and his brother [[Anders Johansson (drummer)|Anders]] (drums) joined [[Yngwie Malmsteen]]'s "Rising Force". Jens is the son of the Swedish Jazz pianist [[Jan Johansson (jazz musician)|Jan Johansson]]. Jens has also worked with the guitar player [[Allan Holdsworth]].  

He's currently working with the Finnish [[power metal]] band [[Stratovarius]] and [[Ritchie Blackmore]]'s rock project [[Rainbow (rock band)|Rainbow]]. He is notable for his high-speed and technical skills in the style of [[Neoclassicism (music)|neoclassical]][[Jazz fusion|, fusion]] and rock.
